titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require all wage withholding returns to be filed electronically.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require all wage withholding returns to be filed electronically.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require all employers to file wage withholding return information on magnetic media. Allows a waiver of such requirement for employers demonstrating hardship or having five or fewer employees.
